      public ClientExceptionHandler()

  • Method Details

    • visualType

      public void visualType​(boolean isCli)
      Sets the visualization type for the error generated Client-side
      Parameters:
      isCli - defines if the error has to be generated in a Gui enviroment (false) or in a Cli enviroment (true). Has to be set at the beginning, after the selection of cli or gui.

    • addressValidator

      public boolean addressValidator​(java.lang.String address) throws java.lang.Exception
      Checks if the client is trying to connect to an illegal address
      Parameters:
      address - the address the user has inserted
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • portValidator

      public boolean portValidator​(int port) throws java.lang.Exception
      Checks if the user wants to connect to a reserved port or an illegal port
      Parameters:
      port - the port the user is trying to establish a connection to
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • guiError

      public void guiError​(java.lang.String message) throws java.lang.Exception
      Displays an Alert Box for the user to see if the game is set to Gui Mode.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to display
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • cliError

      public void cliError​(java.lang.String s)
      Displays an Alert Box for the user to see if the game is set to Cli Mode.
      Parameters:
      s - the message to display

    • nameValidator

      public boolean nameValidator​(java.lang.String name) throws java.lang.Exception
      Checks if the user has provided a valid name
      Parameters:
      name - the string the user wants to set as a username
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception
